alert.note: Alert for Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 18 at 1:14PM EDT until April 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Continued Dry Conditions and Gusty Winds Will Create an Enhanced Risk for Wildfire Ignition and Spread Today... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR PIKE COUNTY... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 120 Pike. * TIMING...Noon today to 8 PM EDT this evening * WINDS...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 20 to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...There is an enhanced risk of wildfire ignition and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
